feed.title: theausinstitute TikTok
feed.subtitle: OK Boomer, all the latest TikToks from theausinstitute

entry.title: "The Voice is a metaphor, because we've been talking to successive governments for generations. "Sometimes they listen, but there is no bind on them to take any notice of us." - Pat Anderson AO, Alyawarre woman and architect of the Uluru Statement from t
entry.content: "The Voice is a metaphor, because we've been talking to successive governments for generations. "Sometimes they listen, but there is no bind on them to take any notice of us." - Pat Anderson AO, Alyawarre woman and architect of the Uluru Statement from the Heart. #auspol #VoteYES23

entry.title: Where did the idea for the Voice originate? Aunty Pat talks us through the generations of work that have led to the vote on Saturday. Watch the full Q&A on our Youtube channel #auspol #VoteYes23
entry.content: Where did the idea for the Voice originate? Aunty Pat talks us through the generations of work that have led to the vote on Saturday. Watch the full Q&A on our Youtube channel #auspol #VoteYes23

entry.title: This Saturday, Australia will vote on the proposal for an Indigenous Voice to Parliament. Make sure your voice is heard. The Australia Institute is proud to be a longstanding supporter of a constitutionally enshrined Voice, as articulated in the Uluru Sta
entry.content: This Saturday, Australia will vote on the proposal for an Indigenous Voice to Parliament. Make sure your voice is heard. The Australia Institute is proud to be a longstanding supporter of a constitutionally enshrined Voice, as articulated in the Uluru Statement from the Heart. #auspol #VoteYes23 #Yes23

entry.title: We've come up with four ways to make the Stage 3 tax cuts fairer, giving 80% of taxpayers a bigger slice of the pie. Oh, and we'd still have enough money left over to increase JobSeeker to $250 a fortnight, while spending less than the Stage 3 tax cuts.
entry.content: We've come up with four ways to make the Stage 3 tax cuts fairer, giving 80% of taxpayers a bigger slice of the pie. Oh, and we'd still have enough money left over to increase JobSeeker to $250 a fortnight, while spending less than the Stage 3 tax cuts. Read the full report here on our website, link in bio. #auspol #economics

entry.title: ❌ Enough is enough. Our democracy is too important to let lies & misinformation run rampant. ✅ We need truth in political advertising laws before the next federal election. South Australia & ACT already have truth in political advertising laws that work.
entry.content: ❌ Enough is enough. Our democracy is too important to let lies & misinformation run rampant. ✅ We need truth in political advertising laws before the next federal election. South Australia & ACT already have truth in political advertising laws that work. "Different opinions are inevitable, but we shouldn't let people deliberately mislead others," "Democracy is too important to let ppl do it deliberate harm." said Richard Denniss. #auspol
